languages.text: От огромной горнодобывающей машины исходят волны жара. Перегрев мог быть причиной остановки работ.
Heat waves emanate from the huge mining machine. Overheating could be the cause of the work stoppage.
languages.original_text: От огромной горнодобывающей машины исходят волны жара. Перегрев мог быть причиной остановки работ.

traits.locale_text: Heat waves emanate from the huge mining machine. Overheating could be the cause of the work stoppage.
Heat waves emanate from the huge mining machine. Overheating could be the cause of the work stoppage.
Heat waves emanate from the huge mining machine. Overheating could be the cause of the work stoppage.
Heat waves emanate from the huge mining machine. Overheating could be the cause of the work stoppage.
Heat waves emanate from the huge mining machine. Overheating could be the cause of the work stoppage.

languages.text: Die enorme Bergbaumaschine strahlt Hitzewellen ab. Überhitzung könnte die Ursache der Arbeitseinstellung sein.
languages.original_text: Heat waves emanate from the huge mining machine. Overheating could be the cause of the work stoppage.

traits.locale_text: Die enorme Bergbaumaschine strahlt Hitzewellen ab. Überhitzung könnte die Ursache der Arbeitseinstellung sein.

languages.text: Des vagues de chaleur s'échappent de la gigantesque machine minière. La surchauffe pourrait bien être la cause de l'interruption du travail.
languages.original_text: Heat waves emanate from the huge mining machine. Overheating could be the cause of the work stoppage.

traits.locale_text: Des vagues de chaleur s'échappent de la gigantesque machine minière. La surchauffe pourrait bien être la cause de l'interruption du travail.

languages.text: 巨型采矿器械散发着一阵又一阵的热浪，过热可能正是它停止运转的原因。
languages.original_text: Heat waves emanate from the huge mining machine. Overheating could be the cause of the work stoppage.

traits.locale_text: 巨型采矿器械散发着一阵又一阵的热浪，过热可能正是它停止运转的原因。

languages.text: La enorme máquina minera emite oleadas de calor. Es posible que el trabajo se haya detenido por sobrecalentamiento.
languages.original_text: Heat waves emanate from the huge mining machine. Overheating could be the cause of the work stoppage.

traits.locale_text: La enorme máquina minera emite oleadas de calor. Es posible que el trabajo se haya detenido por sobrecalentamiento.

languages.text: 巨大な採掘機から熱波が放たれている。過熱が作業停止の原因かもしれない。
languages.original_text: Heat waves emanate from the huge mining machine. Overheating could be the cause of the work stoppage.

traits.locale_text: 巨大な採掘機から熱波が放たれている。過熱が作業停止の原因かもしれない。

languages.text: Devasa kazı makinesinden ısı dalgaları yayılıyor. Aşırı ısınması işin duraksamasına sebep olabilir.
languages.original_text: Heat waves emanate from the huge mining machine. Overheating could be the cause of the work stoppage.

traits.locale_text: Devasa kazı makinesinden ısı dalgaları yayılıyor. Aşırı ısınması işin duraksamasına sebep olabilir.
